block.p: Robyn Ann Brown, a daughter of Joel S. Brown of Bloomfield, Mich., and the late Rosalie D. Brown, was married yesterday to Thomas Perry Forman, a son of Jane P. and Charles D. Forman of Brookline, Mass. Rabbi Tamara R. Kolton performed the ceremony at the Cliffside Beach Club in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Forman, 27, is the senior beauty features editor at Glamour magazine in New York. She graduated from Columbia, as did the bridegroom. Her father is an estate and financial planner at Financial Associates in Southfield, Mich.

Robyn Ann Brown, a daughter of Joel S. Brown of Bloomfield, Mich., and the late Rosalie D. Brown, was married yesterday to Thomas Perry Forman, a son of Jane P. and Charles D. Forman of Brookline, Mass. Rabbi Tamara R. Kolton performed the ceremony at the Cliffside Beach Club in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Forman, 27, is the senior beauty features editor at Glamour magazine in New York. She graduated from Columbia, as did the bridegroom. Her father is an estate and financial planner at Financial Associates in Southfield, Mich.

Mr. Forman, also 27, is a segment producer for ''48 Hours,'' the CBS News program in New York. His mother is an interior designer in Brookline. His father is the executive vice president of Key3Media, a computer trade show producer in Needham, Mass.
